content.webTitle: Basketball: Everton Tigers ready to roar as newcomers to league

fields.headline: Everton Tigers ready to roar as newcomers to league
fields.bodyText: Everton Tigers are the latest addition to the ranks of the British Basketball League, raising the number of teams in the top flight next season to 13. The Tigers, the third team to join this summer after London Capital and Birmingham Panthers, are an amalgam of the Toxteth Tigers club and the Everton in the Community scheme run by the Premiership football club. Henry Mooney will coach the Tigers. Manchester United, Leicester City, Newcastle United and Rangers football clubs have previously fielded teams in British basketball but the link between the sports has been absent since Newcastle Eagles left the Newcastle Sporting Club in 2002.
